nodes.text: A Song of Swarming was music created by the insectoid Killiks of Alderaan which was used to summon more of the Kind when they moved to claim more territory. During the Cold War, Daria Thul became a Joiner and warned a Sith representative to depart the mines as her Killik nest had sung a Song of Swarming which meant that they were claiming the area as part of their territory.
